ygData.subject: RE: Freeport/Queens Faction Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Nah - it s like spells - it would poof when you died. ... From: LBuddah13@aol.com [mailto:LBuddah13@aol.com] Sent: Monday, September 13, 1999 3:45 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
Nah - it's like spells - it would poof when you died.



-----Original Message-----
From: LBuddah13@... [mailto:LBuddah13@...]
Sent: Monday, September 13, 1999 3:45 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Freeport/Queens Faction Question


From: LBuddah13@...

I thought of a way to get the guild note of a freeport monk, I do not know
if
it works but it is worth a try. What you do is create a freeport monk bring

him to the newbie zone and fight an orc, let the orc kill you. Then when
you
go back to your bind point consent your quenos monk, then log on with your
quenos monk and loot the corpse. If it works it should give you the guild
note.
